name: i1 - Eleven
description:
The game is a demo that showcases the major feature of the game. The story of the game revolves around 11, a character that seeks to fix the mistakes made by a scientist named Ian. On the journey both the characters try to fix the city that they love and stop the corporations. 

The game is a 2D platformer game that is based in a futuristic cyberpunk city, where the rich live in the heights of luxury and the poor live in the depths of the city. The game takes place 10 years after the city's growth as it basks in the glory of technology.

Ian is someone who has developed this technology that is on the wrong hand can do a lot of harm, soon he realizes that the people he works for are trying to use this technology to develop the city in a way where they would get filthy rich. He tries to stop this which leads to him getting fired and living alone in the poor. Soon he starts exhibiting weird behavior as a character named 11 starts causing trouble for the corporation and knows all its secrets, which later is revealed that 11 is Ian himself trying to fix his mistakes.

Ian has developed watch whist he lives in the depths of poverty that lets him control the time in his space which is used by 11 to destroy their enemies.

Later in a twist of events, it is found that 11 and Ian are not one, instead of two different characters themselves and are helping each other to fix the city.

A Game By - Bhuvanesh Tekavade
Special Thanks to - Abhimanyu Chattopahyay
